content: TypeScript project follows modular architecture with src/types/, src/core/, src/browser/, src/notebook/, src/cache/, src/performance/, src/history/, src/commands/ structure. Uses async/await throughout, centralized error handling, environment config with validation, Zod schemas for runtime validation, singleton pattern for managers. Built with tsup, Vitest, ESLint, Prettier.

Installation.md follows dual-audience format: 'For Humans' section with quick commands, 'For LLM Agents' section with detailed step-by-step. Must include curl warning for AI agents. Pattern: curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/davehardy20/NotebookLM_Skill/main/docs/installation.md
Prefer nullish coalescing operator (??) over logical OR (||) for default values to avoid bugs with falsy values like 0, '', false

name: node-protocol-imports
description: Use node: protocol for all Node.js builtin imports (fs, path, crypto, etc.) for explicit module origin signaling
